mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from BOARD_5 order by bno desc
select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from BOARD_5 where bno= #{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into BOARD_5 (bno, title, content, writer) values((select nvl(max(bno)+1, 1) from BOARD_5), #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update BOARD_5 set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where bno=#{bno}
update BOARD_5 set viewcnt=(viewcnt +1) where bno=#{bno}
